Title: The Headless Horseman, Returned
Description:
Thomas retreated into the Scarlet Monastery. His ties to this place are strong, even when he is in his corrupted form.

Your name is $n, yes? My husband trusted you to help him, and so I must ask the same. I intend to give chase, but I cannot save him alone.

Will you join me?
ObjectivesText: Use the Group Finder to enter the dungeon, "The Headless Horseman," and defeat the Headless Horseman.
